name: Go to Heck 💀
description:
Descend into a cyber heckspace, battle robots and ghosts, and see how deep you can go. Go to Heck is a sidescrolling roguelite with lots of bloom. Pull up your favourite outrun 10 hour mix on YouTube and give it a go!

Controls:

WASD to move

LMB to shoot railgun

RMB to shoot grappling hook
